name: RapidVoltGirl
description:
An updated version of Rapid Volt Girl from GalwayGameJam #5 with many (if not all) bugs fixed.

Your name is Lexie.

You can't remember much. There was an experiment, it went wrong and it warped the world beyond recognition.

The barrier between dimensions has been shattered

The experiment also changed you, you're faster, electrical, a Rapid Voltage Girl.

You have no other choice than to try to use your newfound skills to try to reverse the experiment.

Are you up to the task?
